isis.stitle: TSI 96-12-18 - Revision To Special Torque Value For Fuel Injector Hold Down Clamp Mounting Bolt

subjectgroup.subject: Revision To Special Torque Value For Fuel Injector Hold Down Clamp Mounting Bolt

svcproc.title: DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: A revision to the special torque value for the fuel injector hold down clamp mounting bolt is as follows:
Fuel Injector Hold Down Clamp Mounting Bolts - 12 Nm (105 lb-in.)
Fuel Injector Hold Down Clamp Mounting Bolts - 14 Nm (120 lb-in.)

note.para: Keep a copy of this letter with Service Manual, EGES 120, until it is updated.
